name: tateti-arbitro
description: Arbitro para partidas de Ta-Te-Ti entre bots HTTP.

scripts.test:full: npm run test:unit && npm run test:client
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:client
scripts.qa:format: npm run format:check && cd client && npm run format:check
scripts.qa:lint: npm run lint && npm run lint:client
scripts.qa:test:unit: npm run test:unit && npm run test:client
scripts.qa:precommit: echo 'ğŸ” Layer 1: Pre-commit QA (Fast)...' && npm run format:check && cd client && npm run format:check && cd .. && npm run lint && npm run lint:client && npm run test:unit && npm run test:client && echo 'âœ… Pre-commit QA passed!'
scripts.qa:prepush: echo 'ğŸ” Layer 2: Pre-push QA (Comprehensive)...' && npm run qa:precommit && npm run test:integration && cd client && npm run build && cd .. && echo 'âœ… Pre-push QA passed!'
scripts.qa:cicd: echo 'ğŸ” Layer 3: CI/CD QA (Complete)...' && npm run qa:prepush && npm run build:all && echo 'âœ… CI/CD QA passed!'
scripts.build:frontend: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:backend:frontend
scripts.clean:docker: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.clean:all: npm run docker:down && npm run clean:docker
scripts.docker:smoke: npm run build:frontend && docker-compose -f docker-compose.smoke.yml up --build
scripts.docker:4player: npm run build:frontend && docker-compose -f docker-compose.4player.yml up --build
scripts.docker:8player: npm run build:frontend && docker-compose -f docker-compose.8player.yml up --build
scripts.docker:down: docker-compose down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.smoke.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.4player.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.8player.yml down
scripts.deploy:smoke: npm run qa:precommit && npm run docker:smoke
scripts.deploy:4player: npm run qa:precommit && npm run docker:4player
scripts.deploy:8player: npm run qa:precommit && npm run docker:8player
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run qa:full && npm run docker:prod
